00049 #define RTC_ADDR_REG 0x70 ///< I/O address that contains the RTC address to communicate with 
00050 #define RTC_DATA_REG 0x71 ///< I/O address that contains the data read from or written to the RTC

00055 #define RTC_UIP (1 << 7) ///<  1-update in progress, 0-data valid for next 244 usec
00056 #define RTC_DV2 (1 << 6) ///< Divider
00057 #define RTC_DV1 (1 << 5) ///< Divider
00058 #define RTC_DV0 (1 << 4) ///< Divider
00059 #define RTC_RS3 (1 << 3) ///< Rate selector
00060 #define RTC_RS2 (1 << 2) ///< Rate selector
00061 #define RTC_RS1 (1 << 1) ///< Rate selector
00062 #define RTC_RS0 (1 << 0) ///< Rate selector
00063 
00067 #define RTC_SET  (1 << 7) ///< 1-Stop updating, 0-update normally 
00068 #define RTC_PIE  (1 << 6) ///< 1-Periodic interrupt enable
00069 #define RTC_AIE  (1 << 5) ///< 1-Alarm interrupt enable
00070 #define RTC_UIE  (1 << 4) ///< 1-Update-ended interrupt enable
00071 #define RTC_SQWE (1 << 3) ///< 1-Square Wave Enable
00072 #define RTC_DM   (1 << 2) ///< Data Mode, 1-Binary, 0-BCD 
00073 #define RTC_12_24 (1 << 1) ///< 1-24 hours, 0-12 hours
00074 #define RTC_DSE  (1 << 0) ///< 1-Day-light saving
00075 
00079 #define RTC_IRQF (1 << 7) ///< 1-An interrupt occurred, if PF=PIE=1 || AF=AIE=1 || UF=UIE=1 
00080 #define RTC_PF   (1 << 6) ///< 1-Periodic interrupt occurred
00081 #define RTC_AF   (1 << 5) ///< 1-Alarm interrupt occurred
00082 #define RTC_UF   (1 << 4) ///< 1-Update interrupt occurred
00083 
00087 #define RTC_VRT (1 << 7) ///< 1-Valid RAM and time
